#include <stdio.h>

struct TNode {
  long long l;
  long long r;
  int fill;
  TNode *left;
  TNode *right;  
} *root;

int T;
int N, Q;
int i;
long long l, r, q;

void insert(TNode *node, long long l, long long r)
{
   long long L = node->l;
   long long R = node->r;
   long long C = (L+R)/2;
   
   if (l <= L && R <= r) {
     node->fill = 1;
     return;
   }
   
   if (r <= C) {
     if (node->left == NULL) {
       node->left = new TNode;
       (node->left)->l = L;
       (node->left)->r = C;
       (node->left)->fill = 0;
       (node->left)->left = NULL;
       (node->left)->right = NULL;
     }
     insert(node->left, l, r);
     return;
   }
   
   if (l >= C+1) {
     if (node->right == NULL) {
       node->right = new TNode;
       (node->right)->l = C+1;
       (node->right)->r = R;
       (node->right)->fill = 0;
       (node->right)->left = NULL;
       (node->right)->right = NULL;
     }
     insert(node->right, l, r);
     return;
   }

   if (node->left == NULL) {
     node->left = new TNode;
     (node->left)->l = L;
     (node->left)->r = C;
     (node->left)->fill = 0;
     (node->left)->left = NULL;
     (node->left)->right = NULL;
   }
   insert(node->left, l, C);

   if (node->right == NULL) {
     node->right = new TNode;
     (node->right)->l = C+1;
     (node->right)->r = R;
     (node->right)->fill = 0;
     (node->right)->left = NULL;
     (node->right)->right = NULL;
   }
   insert(node->right, C+1, r);
   
   return;
}


bool srch(TNode *node, long long v)
{
  if (node->fill == 1) return true;
  
  long long L = node->l;
  long long R = node->r;
  long long C = (L+R)/2;
  
  if (v <= C) {
    if (node->left == NULL) return false;  
    return srch(node->left, v);
  }

  if (v > C) {
    if (node->right == NULL) return false;  
    return srch(node->right, v);
  }
  
  return false;
}

int main() {

  scanf("%d", &T);
  while (T--) {
    scanf("%d %d", &N, &Q);
    
    root = new TNode;
    root->l = 1LL; root->r = 17179869184LL;
    root->fill = 0;
    root->left = NULL;
    root->right = NULL;
    
    for (i = 0; i < N; i++) {
      scanf("%lld %lld", &l, &r);
      insert(root, l, r);
    }

    for (i = 0; i < Q; i++) {
      scanf("%lld", &q);
      if (srch(root, q))
	printf("NO\n");
      else
	printf("YES\n");
    }
    
  }
  
  
  return 0;
}
